meanings.definition: A movable indicator on a computer screen used to point to a particular item.
meanings.sent1: The cursors on the screen helped me click on the right icon.
meanings.sent2: She moved the cursors swiftly to select the desired option.
meanings.sent3: The cursors on the screen seemed to have a mind of their own, dancing around.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved the cursors like a skilled conductor leading an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The bright red cursors stood out against the dark background, guiding my actions.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that precedes or indicates the approach of someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The distant sound of drums served as the cursors of the approaching parade.
meanings.sent2: The dark clouds were the cursors of the impending storm.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog acted as a noisy cursors for the arrival of the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The first drops of rain were like cursors signaling the start of the downpour.
meanings.sent5: The early morning chirping birds were the cheerful cursors of the new day.
